00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         AVR specific definitions for the rs232 port.
00037  *
00038  * \author
00039  *         Simon Barner <barner@in.tum.de
00040  */
00041 
00042 #ifndef __RS232_AT90USB1287__
00043 #define __RS232_AT90USB1287__
00044 
00045 /******************************************************************************/
00046 /***   Includes                                                               */
00047 /******************************************************************************/
00048 #include <avr/io.h>
00049 
00050 /******************************************************************************/
00051 /***   RS232 ports  - Has only UART1, map it into port 0                      */
00052 /******************************************************************************/
00053 #define RS232_PORT_0 0
00054 
00055 /******************************************************************************/
00056 /***   Baud rates                                                             */
00057 /******************************************************************************/
00058 #if (F_CPU == 16000000UL)
00059 /* Single speed operation (U2X = 0)*/
00060 #warning 16MHz
00061 #define USART_BAUD_2400 416
00062 #define USART_BAUD_4800 207
00063 #define USART_BAUD_9600 103
00064 #define USART_BAUD_14400 68
00065 #define USART_BAUD_19200 51
00066 #define USART_BAUD_28800 34
00067 #define USART_BAUD_38400 25
00068 #define USART_BAUD_57600 16
00069 #define USART_BAUD_76800 12
00070 #define USART_BAUD_115200 8
00071 #define USART_BAUD_230400 3
00072 #define USART_BAUD_250000 3
00073 #define USART_BAUD_500000 1
00074 #define USART_BAUD_1000000 0
00075 #elif (F_CPU == 8000000UL)
00076 /* Single speed operation (U2X = 0)*/
00077 #define USART_BAUD_2400 207
00078 #define USART_BAUD_4800 103
00079 #define USART_BAUD_9600 51
00080 #define USART_BAUD_14400 34
00081 #define USART_BAUD_19200 25
00082 #define USART_BAUD_28800 16
00083 #define USART_BAUD_38400 12
00084 #define USART_BAUD_57600 8
00085 #define USART_BAUD_76800 6
00086 #define USART_BAUD_115200 3
00087 #define USART_BAUD_230400 1
00088 #define USART_BAUD_250000 1
00089 #define USART_BAUD_500000 0
00090 #else
00091 #error "Please define the baud rates for your CPU clock: ATmega128 handbook p. \
00092 195-198 or set the rate in contiki-conf.h"
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 
00096 /******************************************************************************/
00097 /***   Interrupt settings                                                     */
00098 /******************************************************************************/
00099 #define USART_INTERRUPT_RX_COMPLETE _BV (RXCIE1)
00100 #define USART_INTERRUPT_TX_COMPLETE _BV (TXCIE1)
00101 #define USART_INTERRUPT_DATA_REG_EMPTY _BV (UDRIE1)
00102 
00103 /******************************************************************************/
00104 /***   Receiver / transmitter                                                 */
00105 /******************************************************************************/
00106 #define USART_RECEIVER_ENABLE _BV (RXEN1)
00107 #define USART_TRANSMITTER_ENABLE _BV (TXEN1)
00108 
00109 /******************************************************************************/
00110 /***   Mode select                                                            */
00111 /******************************************************************************/
00112 #define USART_MODE_ASYNC 0x00
00113 #define USART_MODE_SYNC _BV (UMSEL00)
00114 
00115 /******************************************************************************/
00116 /***   Parity                                                                 */
00117 /******************************************************************************/
00118 #define USART_PARITY_NONE 0x00
00119 #define USART_PARITY_EVEN _BV (UPM01)
00120 #define USART_PARITY_ODD  _BV (UPM01) | _BV (UPM00)
00121 
00122 /******************************************************************************/
00123 /***   Stop bits                                                              */
00124 /******************************************************************************/
00125 #define USART_STOP_BITS_1 0x00
00126 #define USART_STOP_BITS_2 _BV (USBS)
00127 
00128 /******************************************************************************/
00129 /***   Character size                                                         */
00130 /******************************************************************************/
00131 #define USART_DATA_BITS_5 0x00
00132 #define USART_DATA_BITS_6 _BV (UCSZ10)
00133 #define USART_DATA_BITS_7 _BV (UCSZ11)
00134 #define USART_DATA_BITS_8 _BV (UCSZ11) | _BV (UCSZ10)
00135 // #define USART_DATA_BITS_9 (needs also UCSZ2 bit in UCSRnB)
00136 
00137 /******************************************************************************/
00138 /***   Clock polarity                                                         */
00139 /******************************************************************************/
00140 #define USART_RISING_XCKN_EDGE 0x00
00141 #define USART_FALLING_XCKN_EDGE _BV (UCPOL0)
00142 
00143 
00144 #endif /* #ifndef __RS232_AT90USB1287__ */
